purpose: The email serves as a call for participation in the 41st IEEE International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution (ICSME 2025) scheduled in Auckland, New Zealand.
evidence_sentences: ICSME 2025 will be held in Auckland, New Zealand, from Sunday, September 7 to Friday, September 12, 2025.
This is the first call for participation.
join us for a vibrant, global exchange of ideas in one of the most beautiful and dynamic cities in the southern hemisphere.
